Title: 2. Stakeholders
Write-Up Text: People are talking - the Labor party is making significant moves to increase the minimum wage provide pay rises for aged care workers and simplify bargaining - taking action to get those wages moving once again. On social media users express excitement for conferences and applaud updates to the social security guide while others criticize Albanese's immigration plan and call attention to Australia's economic crises. Finally delivering a record 15% pay increase for aged care workers remains a popular subject of discussion.
